scenes.background: You and your colleagues decide to focus on the report first. [Monica] looks concerned.
scenes.description: [Monica] says, 'Focusing on the report first might indeed delay the presentation. Are we sure that's the best course?'

options.text: We should stick to the plan and finish the report first. Itâ€™s crucial.

options.text: Maybe we can allocate tasks better. I'll manage the report while you start on the presentation.
options.analysis: You balance social skills and emotional perception, but motivation might be lower due to task splitting.

options.text: We might need to reconsider and prioritize the presentation. Let's discuss.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and empathy, but emotional perception might be lower as you shift priorities.
